title: （搬运）YogBox-精心挑选并汇集了所有优秀MOD的懒人包
txt_content:
本帖最后由 6658698 于 2011-12-14 21:29 编辑 

  第一次搬运，，求人气！
YogBox是一个不断更新添加优秀mod的懒人包, 绝对无恶意软件和病毒(!) ，提高minecarft单机玩家的游戏享受, 让你迷上minecarft.
这些MOD都是经过精心挑选的The,这些MOD就像一个一个的原料.
作者就像厨师将这些原料结合起来，给玩家呈现一道精美的菜肴。
注：当你要使用新版本时，请确保你使用的是纯净的minecraft.jar
另外请最好在使用新版本前先备份你的地图文件，以防发生错误.
如果你感觉卡或者帧数明显不够，按Ctrl + Shift+ P，开启MILLENAIRE二进制路径
推荐使用OPTIFINE MOD，这个MOD与yogbox兼容，并且支持高清材质
下载：
[版本 1.8.1 v1.0a]:
http://skylands.goonygoon.com/YogBox_1.8.1_v1.0a.zip
http://www.phoenixscripts.com/mirrors/minecraft/YogsCast/YogBox_1.8.1_v1.0a.zip
http://www.mediafire.com/file/002u775c8py1bnh/YogBox_1.8.1_v1.0a.zip
115网盘：http://115.com/file/aq7xs8p2（推荐，带有中文安装向导）
无法搞到纯净MINECARFT的下载本站的mc绿色sp版本 (1214)

安装说明：
1) 在安装前，确保是使用的是纯净的MINECRAFT.JAR (使用force update 获取纯净版的minecarft.jar)! 另外如果你有先前安装的MODS或者MILLENAIRE文件夹, 为避免发送错误，请移除或备份这些文件夹!
2)解压到随意地方，然后运行YOGBOX Installer.jar (右键, 用JAVA打开) 然后根据屏幕提示. 选择 no optional mods 只会安装核心MOD.
3) 运行游戏! 你也学可以选着Kas’s 材质包 ，在使用这个材质包时将会获得过多乐趣!
kas’s自定义材质http://painterlypack.net/customizer.php
以下列出的MOD都包含在此懒人包中了
=====
Inventory Tweaks by jimeowan（背包整理，搜索本站能找到说明哦）
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/…s-120-july-27/
—–
Tweaks inventory handling. Tools/weapons when broken get instantly replaced with another, organized items. R key (by default) or middle mouse click sorts inventory.
=====
Pfaeff’s Mod (核心)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/…-pad-and-more/
—–
Adds useful redstone activated blocks and a slimejump pad!
添加有用的红石激活块和史莱姆跳板
=====
Millenaire by Kinniken（NPC村庄，在本站同样能搜索到说明）
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewto…=1032&t=247048
—–
Adds NPC villages to your world. Read the enclosed Beginner’s Guide PDF for more info! Or visit http://millenaire.wikia.com
=====
Somnia by MALfunction84
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/…tes-the-world/
—–
Adds advanced sleep options and simulated(模拟的) real time while sleeping. Right clicking on a bed while holding a clock will allow you to set your time to wake up.
添加高级睡眠设置以及当睡觉时模拟现实世界，拿着钟右键床可以设置你醒来的时间
=====
ModOptions API by Clintonxa (核心)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewto…=1032&t=207630
—–
This enables GUI style option buttons in Minecraft. Certain mods depend on this.
在MINECRAFT中允许图形化设置按钮，一些MOD需要这个MOD
=====
GUI API by Lahwran (核心)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewto…pi#SettingsAPI
—–
This enables GUI style option buttons in Minecraft. Certain mods depend on this.
在MINECRAFT中允许图形化设置按钮，一些MOD需要这个MOD
=====
Mo’ Creatures by DrZhark（更多生物，搜索本站了解更多信息）
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?t=86929
—–
Adds a plethora(过多) of new mobs and related items to the game world. Advanced settings are under options.
=====
DaftPVF’s mods (Slime Boots, Score, Starting Inventory(存货), Treecapitator, Crystal Wing, Web Generation) (CORE)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewto…=1032&t=132377
—–
Starting Inventory – Starting a new game gives you predefined(预先确定) inventory.
Teecapitator – Trees are tougher to cut, but cutting them with axes at the root makes all the logs fall at once.
Crystal(结晶) Wing – Craftable item. Using this item instantly warps(传送) you to your last spawn(生产) point. Has 8 uses.
=====
Risugami’s Mods (modloader, AudioMod, Death Chest, Shelves, More Stackables, More Arrows, Recipe(食谱) Book) (CORE)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?t=80246
—–
modloader – Pretty important as 90% of the mods in this pack won’t work without it!（必备）
audiomod – Certain mods depend on this.（必备）
Death Chest – Dying while holding a chest in your inventory will place all your items in said chest.（死亡箱子）
Shelves – Craftable shelves which are great for displaying and storing your prized items.（货架）
More Stackables – Enables more items to be stackable(易叠起堆放的) for balancing reasons.（物品堆叠）
More Arrows – Adds elemental(基本的) arrows and a homing bow.（更多弓箭）
Recipe Book – Right clicking while holding this opens the book. Shows all available recipes in the game, including mod items!（合成书）
=====
Airship(飞艇) (CORE) by Pchan3
http://www.steam-craft.com（飞艇MOD）
—–
Adds craftable and ridable(可以骑的) airships! They require coal as a fuel source, and are also able to fire regular arrows. While boarded on an airship press B to open the ship’s inventory(存货) to load it with arrows, coal or whatever else you desire. Pressing C while flying fires arrows. Space ascends(上升), shift(移动) descends(下降). Sky pirates(海盗) is an optional(可选择的) mob mod of hostile(敌对的) airships.
Here’s the ingredients(原料) we have permission to use so far! (Not all of these will be used, but it’s nice to start with a whole bunch(群) of different stuff(东西) available!)
-The excellent Millénaire
-The marvellous(不可思议的) Mo’Creatures by DrZhark
-Hogofwar’s Fossils, Flax, Sulphur, Peaceful Pack, Biome Caves, Tree Dungeons, Easy Custom Furnace Fuels
-Nandonalts Mods Notable(值得注意的): More Trees, Beekeeping, Coral Reefs
-Lahwran’s Mods Notable: Various UI Mods + Biome Terrain Mod
-Transgsenderobot’s Stuff Crystals, Hemp, Beer
-Steveice’s Mods Notable: Watermelons!
-Baby Animals Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhh!!!!!
-Scokeev9′s Stuff Notable(值得注意的): Really nice wood, Manta rays
-Cookies + Jaffa Cakes
-Risugami’s Mods Notable: Mod Loader, Audio Mod, Death Chest, Shelves, More Stackables
-More Health Zelda Style Heart Pieces
-Convenient Inventory
-Somnia
-Great Wall Mod
